Burning up.
Yasuko.
Sandy?

translation.en: but Beck and Yasuko are still out there.

translation.en: Rob, is that you?
Rob, where are you? We're sending people for you.

I can't move anymore. Anymore.
Hey, mate. Yeah, I know. I know, mate. I know.

I can't feel my hands, they're frozen.
Gotta de-ice my mask.
I gotta de-ice my mask.

Avec le soleil, tu vas te réchauffer

Guy. Harold was here. Where's he gone?

Harold...

In that little dip just below the South Summit.

You just gotta, you know, pull yourself up out of that dip

Can you patch Jan through?
-To Rob? -Patch her through, yeah?
Let's just try it. Let's just...
Put the sat phone next to the radio.

Guy to Rob.
Guy to Rob. Can you read me?
-We're just getting... -Rob, are you there? -We're getting him now. -Here.

My Jan?

Jan, you're on.

translation.en: Hi, my love.
I'm a bit...
A bit cold...
but I'm okay.
I know you are.
But the sun'll warm you soon.

You've gotta get moving.
You've gotta come on down.
My hands...
are frozen.
My feet are frozen.

On t'envoie du monde
avec du thé et de l'ox.

translation.en: But you've gotta get moving. Rob? Can you hear me?

translation.en: You've gotta get your circulation going.
Okay, my love.
You do it... You do it right now.
I love you.
Over and out.
Come on, Rob.
We can't carry them.
It's not possible.

I don't wanna die, man.

Yasuko and Beck
did not make it back to camp.

Bub?
Helen Base Camp. Helen Base Camp.
Ang Dorjee, this is Helen.

On essaiera encore

translation.en: Okay.
Hey, Rob, it's Guy, mate.
Can't stop shaking, mate.
The boys have hit a bit of high wind.

translation.en: And your best shot is gonna be to get lower.

translation.en: Let me think about it.
I think I can hang out here another night.

translation.en: We'll try again first thing, okay?
Yeah, he's still there.
He's just below the South Summit.
He's got oxygen, but it's iced up.

Il a de l'oxygène,

translation.en: We don't know whether he's been able to free it.

translation.en: Is anybody with him?

Allez le chercher,
il ne tiendra pas une nuit de plus.

translation.en: We know.
But the storm's come back, real bad.

On ne peut pas
lui envoyer quelqu'un ce soir.

translation.en: We tried.
He might as well be on the moon.

translation.en: Can you put me on with him again?
Of course.
Guy, get Rob.
Hey, Rob, it's Guy.
I've got Jan for you.
Hold on. Give me a sec.
Okay.
Hi, sweetheart.
How are you?
I'm thinking about you.
You sound good.
Are you warm, my love?
I might have a little frostbite.

translation.en: I'm looking forward to making it all better.
I can't wait for you to come home.

translation.en: How's Sarah?
Sarah?
Yeah, Sarah's good.
Will you call her that for me?

translation.en: Yes, I will.
I don't think I'm gonna get to meet her.

translation.en: I'm so sorry.
Don't say that.
If anyone can make it, you can.

translation.en: Remember?
I love you.
Please don't worry too much.

translation.en: Good night, my love.
I love you, Rob.
I love you.
Helen, it's Mike here.
Helen, do you copy?
Mike, come in.
Beck's still alive.
He walked himself into camp.
David Breashears and the IMAX team are gonna get him down to Camp One.
translation.fr: David Breashears et l'équipe Imax vont le redescendre au camp 1.

translation.en: Thanks, Mike.
We don't even know how, but he is alive.

On ne sait pas comment c'est possible,
mais il est vivant.

translation.en: The thing is, Peach,
we can't get him down the Icefall.
translation.fr: il ne passera pas la Cascade.

translation.en: No, I'll get him down.
I'll get him down. Okay.
Okay, what do we need? We need a helicopter, right?

translation.en: Yeah, but they can't take a helicopter up that high because the air is too thin.

Les hélicoptères ne montent pas si haut,

translation.en: We should try, but it is one heck of a risk.

translation.en: And he's not in a good way, Peach, so I don't want you to get your hopes up too high.

Et il ne va pas fort,
alors ne vous réjouissez pas trop vite.

translation.en: One step at a time.
-You gotta keep moving. -Tired. -I know. -I'm tired.
translation.fr:
- Il faut continuer.
- Je suis fatigué.

translation.en: I know you are. Come on.

translation.en: Slow and steady.
Come on, keep moving.
Yes, I'd like the number of the American Embassy in Kathmandu, Nepal.

Je voudrais le numéro de l'ambassade
américaine à Katmandou, au Népal.

translation.en: -Yes, Nepal. -Ambassador, please.
No, sweets, I can't hold.
No, you listen, sir, my husband's already died once as you'll have seen on the news.

Mon mari est mort une fois,
vous l'avez vu aux infos.

translation.en: Trust me, having him die a second time is not gonna play well on CNN.

Le laisser mourir une 2e fois,
ça fera mauvais genre, sur CNN.

translation.en: There we go, buddy.
That's it, all right.
Mike.
How you doing?
You know, fair to middling.
Warming up?
I'm not sure yet.
Look like you are, a little bit.
How's Rob doing?
Rob's still up there right now.

translation.en: Doug's gone, Beck.
I don't know, no one's ever tried to fly higher than Base Camp before, they're gonna give it a go.

On n'a jamais volé plus haut
que le camp de base. Ils vont essayer.

translation.en: You find an LZ, just mark it out with whatever you can.

translation.en: Okay, worth a try. Thanks, Guy.

Chope du Gatorade.
Faut baliser une zone de poser.

Clear everyone back to the tents!

translation.en: Thanks. Keep it clear, keep this whole area clear.
Army 45, keep updating.
Lukla Tower, we're doing fine.
It's not possible!
You land here, we'll never get back up.
Okay, Major, let's go back.
That's it!
We can't get any more out. It's as light as we're gonna get it!
Time to go then, Major.
Right here, right here!
Come on, buddy. You're nearly there.

translation.en: One person. Only one person.
Yeah, it's just him, just one! There.
You're good!
I'm going to lift the tail up, to fly us over the edge.
translation.fr: Je vais plonger au-dessus de la crête

translation.en: Fall a bit, until the blades catch on the air. Is that okay with you?
translation.fr: jusqu'à ce que je récupère de la portance.

translation.en: -I'm with you. -Good man.
I'm so sorry, Helen.
Come on, let's get you inside.
Hi, Peachy.
